lead_paragraph: Former England boss Sam Allardyce has signed a 2-1/2 year contract to take over as manager of Premier League strugglers Crystal Palace, the London club said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Palace Appoint Former England Manager Allardyce
headline.main: Palace Appoint Former England Manager Allardyce

snippet: Former England boss Sam Allardyce has signed a 2-1/2 year contract to take over as manager of Premier League strugglers Crystal Palace, the London club said on Friday....
